body.name: ALHAKIN Rechargeable Makeup Mirror with Lights, 8 inch 10x Magnifying Mirror with 3 Color Lights, Brightness Dimmable Lighted Makeup Mirror for Desk, Black
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 12 mins
features: Rechargeable & Cordless Design - Our light up mirror is powered by built-in 2000mAh rechargeable battery, which can be charged by charging cable (included). Cordless and detachable design allows you to take it wherever you want to go! Detailed Anti-slip base design at the bottom to prevent tipping over. ALHAKIN lighted mirror will shut off automatically after 30 minutes.

3 Color Lighting & Brightness Adjustment - This lighted makeup mirror built-in 54 LEDS with dimmable 3 Color model: warm light, white light and natural light. Short press the touch sensor switch to change the 3 light colors. Long press to adjust the brightness. It also has memory function, it will remember the last brightness you need.

8 Inch Large Size & 360° Rotatable - This vanity mirror is upgraded 8 inch larger size, providing a large and high-definition wide-angle field of view. Make up mirror 360°swivel design allows you to easily find the angle you want, and switch between 1x and 10x magnifying mirror. Construted of premium grade steel, well made with nice black surface, ensuring that it will never rust, corrode.

Double-Sided 1X/10X Magnifying Mirror - 1x Ordinary side allows you to see the overall situation of the face. With 10x Magnificaiton, clearly focus on facial details. Both sides are ideal for everyone applying makeup, shaving, facial treatments and wearing contact lenses. Note: When using the 10x magnification mirror, please keep your face 4 inches away from the mirror to avoid dizziness.

Great Gift Idea & Widely Use - The magnified lighted makeup mirror is a great idea for gift, especially for Christmas, Mothers' day, for sisters, wives, girlfriends. 10X magnifying vanity mirror suitable for bedroom, bathroom, hotel and travel. Just feel free to contact us through the Amazon message center if there is any issue when you receive or use our makeup mirror with lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I appreciate the opportunity to share my thoughts on the makeup light with three light options and a rechargeable cord. The three light settings provide versatility for various makeup applications, ensuring optimal visibility. The convenience of a rechargeable cord adds to its practicality, eliminating the need for constant battery replacements. The sleek design and adjustable brightness make it a valuable addition to my beauty routine. Overall, a reliable and user-friendly makeup light that enhances the application process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Look no further!
reviews.reviewText: This mirror is perfect! It’s sturdy, elegant, and works exactly how I want it to. It’s just the right height and won’t topple over. 10/10 especially for the price. Highly recommend. 👏🏼🤩

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars One Side is Great
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mirror to use as a tool for doing makeup on video, since the mirrors in my house are not set up well for that type of thing. Putting it together was really easy and it seems pretty sturdy. The regular magnification side of the mirror is great. However the magnified side is super wonky - it is extremely distorted and I doubt is what magnification claimed here. It works great for my purposes, as I didn't plan to use the magnified side anyway, but if that is important to you, I'd look elsewhere.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on October 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Reading reviews for 8" makeup mirrors raises many doubts, especially the one and two star variety. Fotunately, the Alhakin mirror is a pleasent surprise. It is a simple, solid design which is also attractive.The marble base provides a stable assembly which goes together in minutes.Very pleased to recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. i was looking for something simple and quality to go with my vanity and this achieved that

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My daughter is very happy with her new makeup mirror, especially that it is lighted.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars The mirror doesn’t charge, therefore lights don’t work
reviews.reviewText: For make up, was a Christmas present

reviews.reviewTitle: At 10 x magnification, you can see every pore! Solid, stable table mirror!
reviews.reviewText: Great table mirror - wasn't able to picture how big 8 in was going to be, ends up it's the perfect size! I can see my whole face easily in the normal view side. The 10x magnification is a lot more than I expected, I can see every eyelash and pore. Great for those who are visually impaired to be able to see to apply makeup. It was easy to put together and had no blemishes or scratches. The base is heavy enough to support the mirror and there is no risk of it tipping over. Comes with stick on non-slip pads for the bottom, and they do work to stop the mirror from sliding around my counter. It looks quite nice on my vanity, and I'm very happy with it!

Super awesome mirror! The mounting base is really nice and heavy so it will take a pretty good bonk to accidentally knock it over. The light is both bright and not blinding so you can actually see your face. You also get a longer than normal usb cable which reaches out outlet near our sink. Seems like a really well made product. Maybe the only minor gripe is that the power button is on the mirror surface itself, would be nicer if that power button was on the base, as you will most likely end up getting finger prints on your mirror as time goes by, leading to more cleaning.

reviews.reviewTitle: Solid large mirror with or without magnification
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice makeup mirror for several reasons. The only thing missing is its own light source.First of all, it is solid. When assembled, it stands robustly on a desk. All pieces, including the base and the stem, are quite solid. Its height seems perfect for most situations, and the swivel top allows you to adjust your view.The mirror is just the right size, large enough to view your face. Having two sides, one with a regular mirror and one with 10x magnification is perfect. As the mirror size is large, the 10x magnification side also gives you a clear view, something you don't get with small mirrors and high magnification factors.Overall it is a great desktop makeup mirror. The only thing missing is a circular LED light source on its rims, otherwise it would have been perfect. If you don't need extra light, I strongly recommend it.
Love the integrated light feature. Great as a gift
